pkgModel

Class G1Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • pkgModel.Model
      • pkgModel.G1Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    G1Tutorial

    public class G1Model
extends Model
    Model used for the game 1 logic Created on 11/1/2019
    Author:
    Matthew and Chandler
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      G1Model(boolean decision, GameStatsModel gModel, double canvasWidth, double canvasHeight, double shipWidth, double shipHeight, int rockWidth, int rockHeight, int canWidth, int canHeight)
      Constructor for G1Model which takes dimensions of the canvas and image and generates the ship based off of these conditions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkCollisions()
      checks for collision and updates the colliding objects if one occurs
      java.util.ArrayList<Obstacle> getObstacleList()
      returns the Obstacle list *
      G1Player getPlayer()
      return the Ship object which is the player controlled object
      void keepPlayerInBounds()
      Prevents the player from exiting the screen on the top or the bottom.
      void recycleObstacle(Obstacle obst)
      randomly respawns the obstacles using a gaussian distribution with a mean of 1.2 and a standard deviation of 3 so they appear randomly parallel to the x - axis with random timer
      void update(int yIncr)
      used to move the player up and down, update obstacle positions, call the checkCollisions method and keep the player in bounds using keepPlayerInBounds method.
      void updateObstacleList()
      iterates through obstacleList and calls update on each item.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • G1Model

        public G1Model(boolean decision,
               GameStatsModel gModel,
               double canvasWidth,
               double canvasHeight,
               double shipWidth,
               double shipHeight,
               int rockWidth,
               int rockHeight,
               int canWidth,
               int canHeight)
        Constructor for G1Model which takes dimensions of the canvas and image and generates the ship based off of these conditions.
        Parameters:
        decision - boolean, result of decision to build port
        gModel - GameStatsModel, the gameStatsModel that stores the scoring data between games
        canvasWidth - double, width of canvas
        canvasHeight - double, height of canvas
        shipWidth - double, the width of the ship objects
        shipHeight - double, the height of the ship objects
        rockWidth - int, the width of the rock objects
        rockHeight - int, the height of the rock objects
        canWidth - double, height of can objects
        canHeight - int, width of can objects

    • Method Detail

      • getObstacleList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Obstacle> getObstacleList()
        returns the Obstacle list *
        Returns:
        ArrayList, list of Obstacles that are recycled for the game.

      • getPlayer

        public G1Player getPlayer()
        return the Ship object which is the player controlled object
        Returns:
        G1Player, ship, the object that is representing the player character.

      • keepPlayerInBounds

        public void keepPlayerInBounds()
        Prevents the player from exiting the screen on the top or the bottom.

      • checkCollisions

        public void checkCollisions()
        checks for collision and updates the colliding objects if one occurs

      • updateObstacleList

        public void updateObstacleList()
        iterates through obstacleList and calls update on each item.

      • recycleObstacle

        public void recycleObstacle(Obstacle obst)
        randomly respawns the obstacles using a gaussian distribution with a mean of 1.2 and a standard deviation of 3 so they appear randomly parallel to the x - axis with random timer
        Parameters:
        obst - obstacle that is being recycled

      • update

        public void update(int yIncr)
        used to move the player up and down, update obstacle positions, call the checkCollisions method and keep the player in bounds using keepPlayerInBounds method. Created on 11/1/2019
        Parameters:
        yIncr - int, corresponding to key input for movement up/down
